Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4709.
_description: Gospel for Sixth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Threfalde folk in halikirkEr sette oure lordes will to
                    wirk…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þare lufe and charite es ayeHe bringe vs þidir
                    þat best maye . Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Þreo Maner folk in holy chircheBen set Godes wille to
                    worche…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And so here vre þouȝtes wisÞat we may come
                    þer þou is. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Amen Amen dico vobis nisi habundauerit (f.
                    200vc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Thre maner of folk in holi kirkAre set oure lordes wille to
                    wirk…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde bryng vs to þat pesÞat ay sale laste and
                    neuer sees
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica via post trinitatis secundum Mathium (p.
                    238)

CULDd11.First Lines:
Thre maner folk in holi chercheben set goddis wil to
                    werche…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& þat is to þe ioye of heueneAmen for his manes
                    seuene
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 6a post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium secundum
                        mathium (f. 152v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Threfalde folk folk in halykyrkEr sett oure lord wyll to
                    wyrk…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Þare lufe and charite es ayHe bryng vs þat best
                    may
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þis es þe gospell on þe sext sonunday (f.
                    100v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
ÞReo maner folk in holichircheBen set godus wille to
                    worche…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And so here vre þouhtes wisÞat we may come þer
                    þou is, Amen
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Amen Amen dico vobis nisi habundauerit (f. 5vc)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Threfalde folke in halikirkeEr sett oure lordes will to
                    wirke…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Thare lufe and charite is ayeHe brynge vs þider þat
                    best may

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Threfalde folke in haly kyrkeer sett oure lordis worde to
                    wyrke…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde brynge vs to þat blysseþare lufe and
                    charyte ay esse

HunHM129.First Lines:
Twynfold folk in holy kyrkIs set oure loueryd will to
                    wyrk…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þare loue and charyte euyr isOure loueryd brynge vs to
                    þat blys
